title: Spacious 1 Bedroom With Central AC!
posting_body: ['317 112th Avenue Northeast, Bellevue, WA 98004', "Metro 112's\xa0lofts, studios, one- and two-bedroom homes epitomize modern living in Bellevue, WA.", 'Offering multiple work from home-friendly nooks to revive your routine like our entertainment suite, rooftop deck, media room, conference room and relaxation courtyard with meditation fountain and fireplace.', '\xa0 Contact us\xa0for additional details about our preferred employer discounts!', 'Community Features:', 'On-site Composting', 'Outdoor Fire Features', 'On-site Recycling', 'Valet Trash', 'Mass Transit Nearby', 'Media Room', 'Dog Friendly', 'New Construction', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'apartments downtown bellevue, apartments near bellevue square, apartments for rent downtown bellevue, apartments near bellevue transit square, downtown bellevue apartments for rent', '*Floor plans and pricing are subject to error, change or deletion.', 'Some photos are for representation purposes only.', 'Please contact us today for the most up to date information!']
